english_translation: Whether someone exists or does not exist, whether someone grieves or does not grieve
Will the earth stop revolving in its orbit?

kannada_original: ಸರದಿ ಬವಣೆಗೆ ಸೋತು ಯಾರ ಕಾಯದು ಲೋಕ ;
english_transliteration: Saradi bavaṇege sōtu yāra kāyadu lōka;
english_translation: The world does not wait for anyone, defeated by cycles of suffering;
Its movement is according to its own destiny - Muddu Rāma.
